description: Houx is one of Chocolat`s best friends from the Magical World. He and Saule are usually seen together and they both help and protect Chocolat. Houx also claims he will be the one to be Chocolat`s husband. He and Saule are also twins as Saule has stated when he, Houx, Chocolat, and Vanilla first meet Waffle and she accuses him of being a fake Houx.
name: Houx
